pr_title: Change format of History records in DB from ISO to epoch

timeline.message: Change forman of History records in DB from ISO to epoch
Change forman of History records in DB from ISO to epoch

timeline.bodyText: I'd add test for the case with 0 millisecond part of the timestamp.
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko

replies.bodyText: It's already there.  TIME_1 is a timestamp with 0 milliseconds. On previous code version this test  fails.
replies.author: niksv
